fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select a teammate at night. They will be converted into another random Institution role (cannot be Institution Power or Relocator.) Takes effect at the start of the next day. You can choose to have a 100% chance to convert them into a Farmer (3936) (you may only do this once.) You can select yourself as a target. Your ability will fail if your target dies on the same night. You may only reassign roles thrice.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Unique role.
- If a player rolls Relocator and there is currently no Leader, turn said player into the Leader.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all that would oppose you. (Wins with Institution and Neutral Benign).
